articles.author: Staff Author
articles.title: The CBOT vs. the CME: What's the Difference?
articles.description: Both the Chicago Board Of Trade and Chicago Mercantile Exchange are futures exchanges, but they offer different futures contracts and specialize in distinct markets/commodities.
articles.content: Both the Chicago Board of Trade (CBOT) and the Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME) trace their roots to 19th-century Chicago, where each began as a nonprofit market for agricultural transactions. While… [+3938 chars]
